document_data.name: Horarn Baergil
document_data.deathnotes: {{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2011)/Captain Baergil}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Horarn Baergil''' was Captain of the [[Riders of Mistledale]], in [[Mistledale]], the [[Dalelands]], in [[1242 DR]]. He was described as a large man who was a reckless hothead. He only served as Captain for a few months of 1242 DR before his death during a battle against brigands in the forests of eastern Mistledale. Horarn was a member of the [[Baergil]] family.{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2011)/Captain Baergil}}
